docs.lead_paragraph: IMMURED within the walls of the Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research as in a fortress, inaccessible and assailed in vain by the most bitter of the anti-vivisectionists, Dr. Alexis Carrel is carrying on wonderful experimental work in plastic surgery, which, in the view of many of the foremost men in the medical world to-day, is destined to entitle him to rank forever with the great pioneers of medicine and surgery.

headline.main: THE MARVELS WROUGHT BY PLASTIC SURGERY; Details of Dr. Alexis Carrel's Remarkable Experiments in the Rockefeller Institute---Transplanting Vital Organs, Bones, and Tissues.
